bibl.title: with contributions by Tomasz DERDA, Renata KUCHARCZYK, Barbara LICHOCKA, Grzegorz MAJCHEREK, Dorota MALARCZYK, Elzbieta MYCIELSKA-DOWGIALLO, Barbara WORONKO and the Mission's architect Daria TARARA, Marea. Vol. 1: Byzantine Marea. Excavations in 2000-2003 and 2006. Avec résumé en polonais. (Biblioteka Muzeum Archeologicznego w Krakowie. IV.)
bibl.biblScope: tabl., nombr. figg. n./bl. et coul., plans, dont plusieurs dépliants.
bibl.note: Foreword (H.S. and Kr.B.). - Part one. Description of the site. - Part two. The baths and saqiyah [VI-VIII cent.]. - Part three. The funerary chapel [VI-VIII cent.]. - Summary in Polish. Bibliography. Abbreviations. - Pp. 169-176: T.D., Inscriptions from the baths and saqiyah [Greek inscriptions on sherds and St. Menas ampullae].
